value.name: AG Balderas Announces Detention and Additional Charges Againt Man Charged with Videotaping His Sexual Abuse Of A Child
value.description: Attorney General Hector Balderas announced that additional charges of Child Exploitation have been filed against Joshua Vigil. Vigil had previously been charged with multiple counts of child exploitation and criminal sexual penetration.

value.name: Child sex abuse suspect facing more charges
value.description: Joshua Vigil was arrested in January after investigators say he molested the son of a friend. The Attorney General says investigators discovered Vigil had recorded video of the incidents and ...

value.name: Joline Gutierrez Krueger: Upfront: Column: Child victims of sex abuse face another horror in NM
value.description: Joshua Vigil, 29, was already charged in January on 17 counts that include rape and criminal sexual contact of a minor and child exploitation by manufacturing child pornography. The four additional charges also involve child porn. Most of the 21 charges ...
